name: @sassoftware/restaflib
description: collection of useful functions for common scenarios
author: Deva Kumar <deva.kumar@sas.com>

scripts.build: rimraf dist && rimraf lib && webpack --env target=node p=n --config webpack.config.js && webpack --env target=web p=n --config webpack.config.js && webpack --env target=web p=y --config webpack.config.js
